reviews.review: The story isn't as great as people hype it up to be but the gameplay makes up for it. 7/10
10/10 с верой что будет продолжение
One of the best games that has come out for this or any other generation. If yo it have my picked this one up or any of the bioshock in that matter, stop what you're doing and enjoy these beauties
Just buy it already. Even better now since it's on sale

虽然游戏已经出很久了，但画面并不落后！令人惊艳的虚幻3作品， 但并没有明显的虚幻血统的油腻感，而且优化很好 大家基本可以开全特效。
游戏的射击手感是复古风，还原90年代FPS的射击手感，如果你是有几十年游戏经验的老玩家，会很有感觉罢。而21世纪的玩家们则要适应一下了(前两作也是如此)
没玩过前两作，玩主线是没有关系，但玩DLC海葬两部曲之前，请通关前作
这部游戏是第九艺术里程碑之作！
大家已经把它捧上神坛我也不必多吹
但我得提一下，这游戏那3%的差评 一大半是不满足于这代的剧情
前作的剧情 封神

战斗之余  记得停下来看看风景
（最后，推荐大家等大促的时候入全家桶，带3作的所有DLC还不是很贵）
神作不解释
死亡轮回系游戏的个人启蒙，如果不是第一人称射击、收集要素更少一点的话我就更喜欢它了！（现在还是很喜欢啦
断断续续的玩了到了结局，不得不说是一个好游戏
so much fun
The game  is legitness

Intriguing story.
Great characters and the actors that voice them.
Environments are pretty.
Gameplay is alright, not that amazing.
The Burial at Sea DLCs are really good.
Крайне необычная (для меня) и невероятно красивая игра. 10/10
Зае.бись, чётко, умеете, могёте, а за персоонажей отдельный +1 балл
nice
This game made me speechless, so during my gameplay I've decided to take one screenshot everytime I wanted to say something nice about it. Now I'm the owner of 104 gorgeous screenshots.

Una joya perdida, Aunque con los años que pase este juego siempre tendrá la mejor historia compleja además de tener esa entrada visual muy hermosa. Lo mismo con los Bioshock anteriores.
This game is really good and it deserves to win a steam award. It has great story and i enjoy playing it alot

Truly a masterpiece. Very very rarely does a piece of media let alone a video game is so moving and engrossing.

Just one word, breathtaking....
Best game
This game surprised me a lot and i enjoyed the game more than i expected.
Buy the entire collection. It's one of the best games and the DLC make it a whole new game.
Great game.

Un juego de entrada visualmente hermoso, y conforme vas avanzando te va atrapando con su jugabilidad y con su gran historia. Vale totalmente la pena,  y si esta en tus posibilidades comprarlo con los DLC's tambien es una buena opcion, sino, el juego base es bastante bueno

O jogo te prende de começo ao fim. Tem personagens marcantes e uma história que é de explodir cabeças!!

great game 10/10
Where is #4?
很有趣的游戏，很好玩
棉花糖一样的白云上漂浮着精致的建筑，横跨天际的铁轨上急驶着老式的电车，远处宏伟的雕像旁游荡着浮夸的飞空艇，回望身边，城市的人们全穿着得体的衣服，堆着刻意的谄笑，过着无忧无虑的生活，一切都显得那样超凡脱俗与纤尘不染……但这真的是人类该有的生活吗？

Pros
- Vivid Graphics
- Interesting Storyline

Cons:
- Short gameplay
Amazing gameplay, story and game in general. Love the timy-whoopie stuff !

Bioshock infinite is a game. Bioshock infinite is a good game. Bioshock infinite has: Good Gunplay, AN INTRESTING COMPANION CHARACTER THAT HELPS YOU and a decent story. Bioshock infinite is a good game.
Just got to love that americana and atmosphere it provides.
La mejor saga que e jugado en toda mi vida,
Buena ambientación e historia : ]
topzera hein.

While I missed Rapture at first, Bioshock Infinite became my favorite in the series pretty quickly. Great story, amazing characters and one of the best voice acting I've ever heard. If you don't have problems with First Person games (i.e. motion sickness), the entire Bioshock series should be in your library. Period.
Bom
Una historia atrapante y digno de ser enviado al espacio

Recomendo pra caramba!!
这游戏讲述了一个“为了女儿，我杀我自己”的故事
mi juego favorito :)

This game. man. this game is a must play for the scenery AND story. It's basically eyep*rn. and the story that follows with it. No need to think about it a second time if you are debating wether to play this game or not!
Love this game.

Emphasises on a great story with compelling characters och even more lore hidden for those who wants to dive even deeper in the fascinating world of Bioshock. The game is pretty linear and it can play out almost as movie as you don't make any defining choices. The comat feels nice and it's satisfying to deafeat enemies. Adjusting difficulty allows you to choose between a laidback style for just experiencing the story or for a more challenging battles. The game is pretty short but it does alot in that time(about 10-20hrs). 
Strongly recommend.
BOOOM
Best story line ive ever played. Great scenery. BEST GAME

Очень рекомендую. Лично меня очень порадовала, сюжет закрученый и интересный. 
Что бы во всем разобраться одного прохождения игры недостаточно!
One of the best games ever made, you need this game in your life

La historia es un 10/10, cierra perfectamente la trilogia de bioshock.
La ambientacion tambien es un 10/10 muy fiel al contexto, con detalles, secretos y referencias por todos lados.
La jugabilidad tambien es muy buena y a diferencia de los otros bioshock solo te deja llevar de a 2 armas que es una decision acertada.
No tiene un multijugador, pero no creo que lo necesite.
En fin muy recomendado.

Best story 
Best gameplay
Best ..... more

This is possibly one of the best games of our generation, coming out in 2015 with a quality of gameplay and story ahead of its time. Some people may write this game off by the date it was released, but I assure you if you are looking for new and fun combat, unique mechanics and a gripping and interesting story then I implore you to play this game and play it in its entirety.
Хороший шутер,интересная концовка и сюжет.

Je veux ce badge steam award, je sais ça sert à rien mais j'ai rien d'autre à faire alors bon^^
En plus ce jeu est insane!! tout le monde le sais:) vivement le prochain!

You play this game through, empathising to the characters, discovering dark stories from their past to get to the ending that answers many questions and yet leave you with many more.

The only downside of this game is that it's story inseparable from the Burial of the Sea DLC. It lures you in, makes you think there is some hope for Booker, and gives you a cold shower of even more darkness.
Bắn khá là sướng tay và cốt truyện cũng khá ảo
Ein muss für Bioshock fans ;)

This Game has a twisted story that keeps you engaged over the whole game and final is absolutely worth it. Elizabeth is the most useful npc that I have seen in a game. This game is fantastic in comparison to the older titles like bioshock 1,2 this one feels like a real fps shooter. Its more lineal then the previous ones BUT the story is as good!

Amazing story.

Incredibly immersive.

Beautiful scenery.

Great Gameplay.

You can invest quite a few hours in it

9/10.
